verses.text: They that trust in the \sc Lord\sc* \add shall be\add* as mount Zion, \add Which\add* cannot be removed, \add but\add* abideth for ever.
\add As\add* the mountains \add are\add* round about Jerusalem, So the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* round about his people From henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; Lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
Do good, O \sc Lord\sc*, unto \add those that be\add* good, And to \add them that are\add* upright in their hearts.
As for such as turn aside \add unto\add* their crooked ways, The \sc Lord\sc* shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: \add But\add* peace \add shall be\add* upon Israel.
